md:
giải nghĩa từ "auction" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Auction (noun)

* Definition: A public sale in which goods or property are sold to the highest bidder.
* Vietnamese translation: Đấu giá
* Part of speech: noun
* Example sentence: The auction house sold the rare painting for a record price.
* Related words: bid, bidder, bidding, sale
* Antonyms: private sale, fixed price sale

Auction (verb)

* Definition: To sell something at an auction.
* Vietnamese translation: Đấu giá
* Part of speech: verb
* Example sentence: The company will auction off the old equipment to raise funds.
* Related words: bid, bidder, bidding, sale
* Antonyms: keep, retain, hold onto

Note: The verb "auction" can also mean to offer something for sale at an auction, as in "The artist will auction her latest painting at the charity event."
